message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob. Let's get this game started!
Let's be fair, Alice.  I'm sure we can both get a good share of this money if we work together.
I think this is a fairer deal for both of us. Let's get this done before the money dwindles further!
Alice, let's split this evenly.  We both know the money is shrinking with each round.  A fair split is the best way to ensure we both get a decent share.
